alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 1:06PM MST until September 13 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST/415 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 103 PM MST /203 PM MDT/, At 103 PM MST /203 PM MDT doppler radar indicated only light showers across the warned area. Thunderstorms earlier produced between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Little CO River Gorge Overlook, Tappan Spring and Navajo Reservation. This includes State Route 64 between mile markers 277 and 293. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Lee Canyon, Tappan Wash, Little Colorado River, Burro Canyon Wash and Cedar Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.5-1.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
